TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsJitIntrinsic extends System.Object
public ref class IsJitIntrinsic abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示某一修饰的方法是一个内部值，实时 (JIT) 编译器可对它执行特殊代码生成。

span.span: Indicates that a modified method is an intrinsic value for which the just-in-time (JIT) compiler can perform special code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器发出元数据，以更改默认行为不恰当时，会在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它将处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法类如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，再将包含的文件内容组合[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
